                        :ARG0-of (x16 / refine-01

# ::date 2021-10-23 08:37:29.997023
# ::id DF-199-194209-587_2515.10
# ::snt @JEJE, You just walk away.
# ::file DF-199-194209-587_2515_10.txt
(x0 / say-01
    :ARG1 (w1 / walk-01
              :ARG0 p2
              :direction (a3 / away)
              :mod (j4 / just))
    :ARG2 (p2 / person
              :wiki -
              :name (n5 / name
                        :op1 "JEJE")))

# ::preferred
# ::annotator bart-amr
# ::date 2021-10-23 08:37:29.997028
# ::id DF-199-194209-587_2515.11
# ::snt Do you really think so little of yourself that you believe this is the best you can do?
# ::file DF-199-194209-587_2515_11.txt
(x0 / think-01
    :mode interrogative
    :ARG0 (y1 / you)
    :ARG1 (t2 / thing
              :mod (l3 / little
                       :degree (s4 / so)))
    :ARG0-of (x5 / cause-01
                 :ARG1 (b6 / believe-01
                           :ARG0 y1
                           :ARG1 (t7 / thing
                                     :ARG1-of (x8 / do-02
                                                  :ARG0 y1
                                                  :ARG1-of (x9 / possible-01))
                                     :ARG1-of (x10 / good-02
                                                   :degree (m11 / most)))))
    :ARG1-of (x12 / real-04))

# ::preferred
# ::annotator bart-amr
# ::date 2021-10-23 08:37:29.997032
# ::id DF-199-194209-587_2515.12
# ::snt A married man who if he really was in love with you would just go ahead and file for divorce now, or at least move out of his house now.
# ::file DF-199-194209-587_2515_12.txt
(x0 / or
    :op1 (g1 / go-06
             :ARG0 (m4 / man
                       :ARG1-of (x14 / marry-01)
                       :ARG0-of l3)
             :ARG1 (f5 / file-01
                       :ARG0 m4
                       :ARG1 (d11 / divorce-01
                                  :ARG0 m4
                                  :ARG1 (y13 / you)))
             :ARG2 (a6 / ahead)
             :mod (j7 / just)
             :time (n8 / now))
    :op2 (m2 / move-01
             :ARG0 m4
             :ARG1 (o9 / out-06
                       :ARG1 m4
                       :ARG2 (h12 / house
                                  :poss m4))
             :mod (a10 / at-least)
             :time n8)
    :condition (l3 / love-01
                   :ARG1 y13
                   :ARG1-of (x15 / real-04)))

# ::preferred
# ::annotator bart-amr
# ::date 2021-10-23 08:37:29.997038
# ::id DF-199-194209-587_2515.13
# ::snt A man who while having a relationship with you is involved in sex chats online with others.
# ::file DF-199-194209-587_2515_13.txt
(x0 / man
    :ARG1-of (x1 / involve-01
                 :ARG2 (c2 / chat-01
                           :ARG1 (s4 / sex-01)
                           :ARG2 (o5 / other)
                           :medium (o6 / online))
                 :time (r3 / relation-03
                           :ARG0 x0
                           :ARG1 (y7 / you))))

# ::preferred
# ::annotator bart-amr
# ::date 2021-10-23 08:37:29.997042
# ::id DF-199-194209-587_2515.14
# ::snt Personally, when you mess with a married man you deserve exactly what you get.
# ::file DF-199-194209-587_2515_14.txt
(x0 / deserve-01
    :ARG0 (y1 / you)
    :ARG1 (t2 / thing
              :mod (e5 / exact)
              :ARG1-of (x6 / get-01
                           :ARG0 y1))
    :condition (m3 / mess-01
                   :ARG0 y1
                   :ARG1 (m4 / man
                             :ARG1-of (x7 / marry-01)))
    :ARG1-of (x8 / personal-02))

# ::preferred
# ::annotator bart-amr
# ::date 2021-10-23 08:37:29.997051

    :ARG2 (p1 / possible-01
              :ARG1 (d2 / do-02
                        :ARG0 (y3 / you)
                        :ARG1 (g4 / good-02

                        :ARG2 y3
                        :manner (w5 / walk-01
                                    :ARG0 y3
                                    :ARG2 (a7 / away
                                              :op1 (h9 / he))
                                    :mod (j8 / just)))))

# ::preferred

              :polarity -
              :ARG0 (y3 / you)

                        :ARG0 y3

                                  :ARG1-of (x6 / attach-01
                                               :polarity -)))))

# ::preferred
# ::annotator bart-amr
# ::date 2021-10-23 08:37:29.997059
# ::id DF-199-194209-587_2515.18
# ::snt Your odds of finding happiness are a bit better going that route in my opinion.
# ::file DF-199-194209-587_2515_18.txt
(x0 / opine-01
    :ARG0 (i1 / i)
    :ARG1 (g2 / good-02
              :ARG1 (o3 / odds
                        :mod (f5 / find-01
                                 :ARG0 y6
                                 :ARG1 (h8 / happy-01
                                           :ARG1 y6))
                        :poss (y6 / you)
                        :ARG1-of (x9 / go-02
                                     :ARG0 y6
                                     :ARG2 (r10 / route
                                                :mod (t11 / that))))
              :degree (m4 / more
                          :degree (b7 / bit))))
